headers.value: X-CSRF-Token, X-Requested-With, Accept, Accept-Version, Content-Length, Content-MD5, Content-Type, Date, X-Api-Version, Authorization

default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://api.twitch.tv https://id.twitch.tv https://www.twitch.tv https://*.twitch.tv; frame-src 'self' https://id.twitch.tv https://www.twitch.tv; form-action 'self' https://id.twitch.tv https://www.twitch.tv;
